name: Roulette Knight (Ludum Dare 41)
description:
Hi, it’s our 12th ludum Dare entry, and this time with game - - - - “Roulette Knight” - - - Shoot your way though the hoards of bullets! Theme of 41th ludum was “Combine 2 Incompatible Genres” and we mix RPG + Russian roulette. All code, art, animation and music were made during the Ludum Dare #41
  • Four Quarters team. https://twitter.com/_FQteam
